imdb.plot outline: The reality TV series follows five handsome, intelligent, funny, somewhat nutty brothers from the tiny town of Batesville, Indiana, who launched an advertising empire after taking a 1 million $ prize in the Doritos Crash the Super Bowl commercial competition in 2009. The Herbert Brothers have developed commercials for Go Daddy , Pepsi and Shasta. The Herbert Brothers is produced by Zig Zag Productions for the A&E Network.
imdb.title: The Herbert Brothers
plot: The reality TV series follows five handsome, intelligent, funny, somewhat nutty brothers from the tiny town of Batesville, Indiana, who launched an advertising empire after taking a 1 million $ prize in the Doritos Crash the Super Bowl commercial competition in 2009. _The Herbert Brothers_ (qv) have developed commercials for Go Daddy , Pepsi and Shasta. _The Herbert Brothers_ (qv) is produced by Zig Zag Productions for the A&E Network.::Steve Pyatte
synopsis: Follow the five Herbert Brothers, Joe, Dave, Matt, Josh and Pete, as they brainstorm, conceptualize, produce, direct and create New York and Hollywood quality commercials for their clients.All of this fun is accomplished with the help of family and friends in their tiny hometown of Batesville, Indiana.The Herbert Brothers not only create professional, high quality fun commercials for their clients, but give them national exposure by airing the commercials they produce at the end of each episode.Casting for the commercials is accomplished using local talent and people who have never acted before. That is the hometown flair behind the highly successful series. You just never know who will turn up in the reality TV show...from the mailman to the manicurist to the local mechanic and more.If you live near the Herbert Brothers, chances are, you could be on TV, too!
